Action.author: jimthematrix
Action.body: ~harrijk this one doesn't need to go through review and voting, as it doesn't touch production code paths in a "risky" way. it can be merged once ready.

Action.author: harrijk
Action.body: ~jimthematrix Thanks for the update. I've just submitted a second CR that includes additional tests. As soon as that verifies, hopefully we can get both merged in.

Action.author: rickr
Action.body: Thanks John I think we're in a good enough shape - closing! Thanks for all the contributions to make it happen.
